name: MerryMen
description:
Let's fight our away and get riches to the poor.

You are in Merryland and it's your responsibility as a MerryMen to fight against the rich people and get all the wealth from them by fighting your way with ferocious guards.

You are equipped with bow and arrow, master your shooting skills to defeat these guards who are equipped with sword and shield.

Controls 

MerryMen (User) has following controls for movement:

You can use mouse movement for setting user's direction.

  1. Move Forward : "W" or Up Arrow Key (↑)
  2. Move Right : "D" or Right Arrow Key (→)
  3. Move Left : "A" or Left Arrow Key (←)
  4. Move Backwards : "S" or Down Arrow Key (↓)
  5. Move at Faster Pace : Shift key + Movement Controls

MerryMen (User) has following controls for shooting arrows from bow:

You can use mouse movement to set the aim of the arrow to specific location.

  1. Equip Bow and Arrow : Right Mouse Key
  2. Shooting Arrow : Left Mouse Key while continuing to press Right Mouse Key.

To start and restart the game :

  • Restart game : "R"
  • Press "Space" bar key to move from cut-scene to gameplay.
Game Rules.
  • Kill all the guards to win the game.
  • Don't let guards come close otherwise they'll kill you.
  • Remember you have limited arrows, so if you finish arrows before killing all guards, you lose.
Features
  • MerryMen (User) can kill the guards using bow and arrow
  • Guards have health bars.
  • Guards have sounds that are triggered when they get hit by arrows and finally die.
  • You can restart the game by pressing key "R".
  • MerryMen (User) can be killed by guards if the user moves close to guards.
  • The merrymen's (user) view can be controlled by mouse movement in different directions.
